patthana10.10:1.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.10:1.1_1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.10:1.1_2: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.10:2.1_0: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.10:3.1_0: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.10:5.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana10.10:5.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke sattarasa …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
